text: Francisco Arturo Alarcón Cruz (, born 25 February 1990) is a Chilean footballer that currently plays for Primera División B club Santiago Wanderers as a Centre back and a Defensive midfielder. ==References== ==External links== * Alarcón at Football Lineups * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Chilean footballers Category:Chilean expatriate footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Sportspeople from Santiago Category:Unión Española footballers Category:Rangers de Talca footballers Category:C.D. title: Francisco Alarcón (footballer)
